titles.title: O God let their marriage shine

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
O God let their
marriage shine
make them seek thy
holy face x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Be their guide in
all endeavours -
make them seek thy
holy face.
Be their hope that
nothing they lack -
make them seek thy
holy face.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let your love
within them shine -
make them seek thy
holy face.
constant source
of great love divine
make them seek thy
holy face.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
As they pledge
their love this day -
make them seek
thy holy face.
Make their hearts
upon you be firm -
make them seek thy
holy face.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Trusting solely
in your power -
Make them seek
thy holy face.
Grant them strength to live
each hour -
make them seek
thy holy face.
